Text: Everyone must drink.
Everyone must drink.
All female players must drink.
Everyone attempts to touch their toes (without bending their knees). Those who can't must drink twice.
The person to have most recently had sex must drink three times.
The tallest and shortest players must each take a sip of the other's drink. Don't forget to give them back afterwards.
Everyone must hold their breath. The first player to give up must drink twice.
Whoever has the most piercings must drink once for every two piercings (earrings count as well).
Any player whose legs are crossed must drink once.
Each player takes a shot. RANDOMPLAYER trades seats with RANDOMPLAYER. RANDOMPLAYER trades shirts with RANDOMPLAYER. And all of them shout an inspiring war cry.
Any players who believe in God must drink.
Everyone must quickly imitate the Captain Morgan pose. Last one to captain must drink.
Blonde players must drink. Blue-eyed players must drink. Both? Drink three times.
All smokers must drink. Anyone currently smoking must drink three times.
All single players must drink.
Youngest player must sit on the oldest player's lap for 4 turns.
Everyone with glasses must drink twice (once for each eye). Those wearing contacts must drink four times (for hiding their eyeball failure).
The last player who went to the bathroom must drink half of what's in their glass.
The player with the biggest boobs may give out two sips for each size above A. Anyone with implants must take a shot.
Whoever's birthday is soonest must drink once for each remaining month. If it is someone's birthday they drink a shot.
If anyone has ever walked in on you while masturbating or during any sexual act, drink.
Each player drinks once for each continent they have been to. If they've been to six, they drink a shot.
Each player drinks once for each language they speak. If they only speak one language, they must drink a shot.
Each player drinks once for each time they have masturbated in the past week, and take a shot for each time had had sex in the past week.
Anyone with more than 15 bucks in their wallet must drink.
Any players born in the current country must drink. Foreigners high five each other.
Anyone who cannot present a condom must drink.
Any player who has used any sort of toy, sexually, must drink twice.
Who of the current players is the most likely to end up under the bridge? That player must get their shit together and drink three times.
The person with the oldest pet drinks.
DON'T READ THIS OUT LOUD. Cough last person to say Baguette drinks 3 sips.
Everyone who ever had a near death experience drinks.
Decide who is the drunkest. That player can give out three sips.
Every player who has had anal sex before drinks.
Everyone drinks RANDOMNUMBER sips.
Everyone who is wearing something black drinks.
Every player who has a condom along must drink.
Decide on the least drunk player. They must drink RANDOMNUMBER sips.
Trebuchet or Catapult? Vote on it. Catapults must drink you plebs.
Any player wearing a ring must drink to rid them of Sauron's influence over them. Drink once for every ring if you're wearing multiple.
There may come a day where our glasses dry out, but it is not this day. FOR FRODO! Everyone drinks.
The person that arrived last must drink. For a wizard is never late, he arrives precisely when he means to drink.
Everyone currently unemployed must drink. A toast to government assistance.
Everyone who studies law, economics, or medicine must drink for their snob studies.
